sentences.en: Facer has fainted; this bucket of water should fetch him round.
sentences.cn: 费塞昏过去了, 这桶水可以使他苏醒过来.

sentences.en: Fetch me a glass of water.
sentences.cn: 去给我拿杯水来。

sentences.en: He sent his driver to fetch him a strawberry shake.
sentences.cn: 他让司机去给他买一杯草莓奶昔。

sentences.en: He went to fetch some books.
sentences.cn: 他去拿一些书来。

sentences.en: How much do you suppose these old books would fetch?
sentences.cn: 你看这些旧书能卖多少钱?

sentences.en: I asked him to fetch me the evening paper.
sentences.cn: 我请他去给我把晚报拿来.

sentences.en: I had to fetch water from the well.
sentences.cn: 我得从井里打水。

sentences.en: It's warm enough to fetch out the garden chairs.
sentences.cn: 天气转暖了,该把花园椅搬出来了.

sentences.en: Quick! Go and fetch a doctor.
sentences.cn: 快！去请医生来。

sentences.en: Rose is very quiet. Try to fetch her out at the party.
sentences.cn: 露丝很文静, 设法鼓励她在聚会上说说话.

sentences.en: Shall I fetch your bag from the next room?
sentences.cn: 我到隔壁房间里把你的包拿来好 吗 ?

sentences.en: Shannon went upstairs to fetch some blankets.
sentences.cn: 香农上楼去拿些毯子。

sentences.en: Should I fetch your slippers?
sentences.cn: 要我去给你拿拖鞋吗？

sentences.en: Sylvia fetched a towel from the bathroom.
sentences.cn: 西尔维娅从浴室拿来一条毛巾。

sentences.en: The painting is expected to fetch at least $20 million.
sentences.cn: 这幅画预计至少能卖两千万美元。

sentences.en: The painting is expected to fetch between two and three million pounds.
sentences.cn: 预计这幅画将售得两三百万英镑。

sentences.en: These goods are obsolete and will not fetch much on the market.
sentences.cn: 这些货品过时了,在市场上卖不了高价.

sentences.en: This announcement fetched a huge cheer from the audience.
sentences.cn: 这一宣告博得听众极其热烈的欢呼声。

sentences.en: We fetch up at the wharf exactly on time.
sentences.cn: 我们准时到达码头.

sentences.en: Why don't you fetch your new girlfriend over? We'd like to meet her.
sentences.cn: 为什么不把你新结识的女朋友带到家里来 呢 ?我们想见见她.

words.tran_cn: 迷人的；动人的；吸引人的

trans.tran_en: to make people react in a particular way

trans.tran_cn: 拿来； 请来， 接去； 售得， 卖得
trans.tran_en: to go and get something or someone and bring them back
